title.rendered: Hab Shifa joins hands with Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
Hab Shifa joins hands with Smile Foundation

Smile Foundation and Australian Organic brand Hab Shifa have joined hands to support the education of underprivileged children under Mission Education initiative through a cause marketing campaign.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children. Since its inception in 2002, more than 200,000 underprivileged children have directly benefitted from the Mission Education programme.

As an Australian company, Hab Shifa has pioneered the First-of-its-kind Black Seed Oil, black seed oil products and Australian Manuka Honey. Health and wellness are at the forefront of the Hab Shifa philosophy, while education and preventative medicine are an integral part of the company’s mission. Hab Shifa black seed oil is produced using patented-cold pressed technology and is currently the only company to have their black seed oil listed with the TGA (Therapeutics Goods Adminstration of Australia). Hab shifa products are available in over 3000 stores across Australia and are currently distributed across the Middle East, Asia and Europe.
